description: 9th Level Games has shared its latest endeavor, “City of Skull,” a comprehensive campaign setting for Mazes Fantasy Roleplaying, now seeking funding on BackerKit. The new campaign, set to be published as a hardcover book, introduces a unique West Marches hex crawler adventure path to the Mazes game series. “City of Skull” offers a vivid...
title: 9th Level Games Announces “City of Skull” Campaign Launch on BackerKit

description: Mantic Games has announced its acquisition of River Horse, a move that consolidates a longstanding collaboration between the two tabletop game developers. This partnership is set to enhance Mantic’s game portfolio by incorporating River Horse’s licensed games and universes. As part of the acquisition, game designer Alessio Cavatore will join Mantic Games. Cavatore has previously...
title: Mantic Games Acquires River Horse in Strategic Partnership

description: DV Games has announced its upcoming lineup of board games set for release in the fourth quarter of 2024. The new titles include “Until Proven Guilty,” “BANG! Dice Explosion,” and “Lost In Adventure – The Labyrinth,” each offering unique gameplay experiences. Until Proven Guilty: A Narrative Legal Game Developed by Enrico Procacci with artwork by...
title: DV Games Announces Three New Board Games for Release Later This Year

description: Free League Publishing announced the release of “Mutant Year Zero: Zone Wars,” a new miniature skirmish game set in the Mutant Year Zero universe. The game invites players to engage in battles for survival and dominance in a post-apocalyptic setting. “Mutant Year Zero: Zone Wars” aims to offer a fast-paced gameplay experience, emphasizing tactical battles...
title: Free League Publishing Releases “Mutant Year Zero: Zone Wars”

description: EN Publishing has recently introduced a Kickstarter campaign for “Voidrunner’s Codex,” an expansion designed to propel Dungeons & Dragons 5E and Level Up: Advanced 5E players into interstellar adventures. The campaign aims to enrich the tabletop RPG experience with an array of new content. The expansion is anchored by the “Voidrunner’s Codex,” a hardcover volume...
title: EN Publishing Launches “Voidrunner’s Codex” on Kickstarter
